tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (VP (VBG Writing) (NP (DT a) (CD 3) (NN hour) (NN government) (NN exam)) (PP (IN at) (NP (NP (CD 8)) (VP (VBP am)))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Writing/VBG dobj>[exam/NN det>a/DT nummod>3/CD compound>hour/NN compound>government/NN] nmod:at>[8/CD case>at/IN dep>am/VBP]]
